member.name: P:IMX.WPF.Resource.DragDropRowBehavior.IsSelecting
member.summary: 表格选中行状态：第一次点击为选中，标识为false，第二次点击为拖动，标识为TRUE；

member.name: M:IMX.WPF.Resource.DragDropRowBehavior.ResetDragDrop
member.summary: Initiates a drag action if the grid is not in edit mode.

member.name: M:IMX.WPF.Resource.UIHelpers.TryFindParent``1(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: Finds a parent of a given item on the visual tree.
member.typeparam: The type of the queried item.
member.param: A direct or indirect child of the queried item.
member.returns: The first parent item that matches the submitted type parameter. If not matching item can be found, a null reference is being returned.

member.name: M:IMX.WPF.Resource.UIHelpers.GetParentObject(System.Windows.DependencyObject)
member.summary: This method is an alternative to WPF's method, which also supports content elements. Do note, that for content element, this method falls back to the logical tree of the element.
member.returns: The submitted item's parent, if available. Otherwise null.

member.name: M:IMX.WPF.Resource.UIHelpers.UpdateBindingSources(System.Windows.DependencyObject,System.Windows.DependencyProperty[])
member.summary: Recursively processes a given dependency object and all its children, and updates sources of all objects that use a binding expression on a given property.
member.param: The dependency object that marks a starting point. This could be a dialog window or a panel control that hosts bound controls.
The properties to be updated if or one of its childs provide it along with a binding expression.

member.name: M:IMX.WPF.Resource.UIHelpers.TryFindFromPoint``1(System.Windows.UIElement,System.Windows.Point)
member.summary: Tries to locate a given item within the visual tree, starting with the dependency object at a given position.
member.typeparam: The type of the element to be found on the visual tree of the element at the given location.
member.param: The main element which is used to perform hit testing.
The position to be evaluated on the origin.

member.name: T:IMX.WPF.Resource.Properties.Resources
member.summary: 强类型资源类，用于查找本地化字符串等。

member.name: P:IMX.WPF.Resource.Properties.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: 返回此类使用的缓存 ResourceManager 实例。

member.name: P:IMX.WPF.Resource.Properties.Resources.Culture
member.summary: 重写当前线程的 CurrentUICulture 属性，对 使用此强类型资源类的所有资源查找执行重写。
